nodes.text: Massoss was a planet of the Chiss Ascendancy in the Unknown Regions, located within a system of the same name. Around 50 BBY, a breakaway alien sect was threatening the Coduyo family holdings on Massoss. The Chiss Defense Force was preoccupied somewhere else and couldn't spare any ships to defend Massoss, but law allowed the Coduyo to declare a family emergency and call Coduyo family members away from their posts in the Fleet to return home and crew Coduyo warships at Massoss.
